channel.title: ByteByteGo Newsletter
channel.description: Explain complex systems with simple terms, from the authors of the best-selling system design book series. Join over 1,000,000 friendly readers.

item.title: 【Uber Reduces Database Lock Time by 94% with Major MySQL Fleet Upgrade】Uber 通过主要 MySQL 队列升级将数据库锁定时间减少了 94%

item.title: 【EP137: Proxy vs Reverse Proxy】EP137：代理与反向代理
item.description: 【A forward proxy is a server that sits between user devices and the internet. A forward proxy is commonly used for:】转发代理是位于用户设备和互联网之间的服务器。转发代理通常用于：

item.title: 【A Pattern Every Modern Developer Should Know: CQRS】每个现代开发人员都应该知道的模式：CQRS
item.description: 【CQRS, which stands for Command Query Responsibility Segregation, is an architectural pattern that separates the concerns of reading and writing data.】CQRS（Command Query Responsibility Segregation）的缩写，是一种分离数据读写关注点的架构模式。

item.title: 【Why Executives Seem Out of Touch, and How to Reach Them】为什么高管们似乎脱节以及如何与他们接触
item.description: 【For this week's issue, I am pleased to introduce our guest author, Ethan Evans, an ex-Amazon VP who played a pivotal role in creating some of the groundbreaking services we use today, such as Prime Video, Amazon Video, the Amazon Appstore, Prime Gaming (formerly Twitch Prime), and Twitch Commerce.】对于本周的期刊，我很高兴向大家介绍我们的客座作者 Ethan Evans，他是一位前亚马逊副总裁，在创建我们今天使用的一些突破性服务方面发挥了关键作用，例如 Prime Video、Amazon Video、Amazon Appstore、 Prime Gaming（以前称为 Twitch Prime）和 Twitch Commerce。

item.title: 【1.8 Trillion Events Per Day with Kafka: How Agoda Handles it】Kafka 每天发生 1.8 万亿个事件：Agoda 如何应对
item.description: 【Cut Code Review Time & Bugs into Half with CodeRabbit (Sponsored)】使用 CodeRabbit（赞助）将代码审查时间和错误减少一半

item.title: 【Event-Driven Architectural Patterns】事件驱动的架构模式
item.description: 【Event-driven architecture (EDA) is a software design approach emphasizing the production, detection, consumption, and reaction to events.】事件驱动架构（EDA）是一种强调事件的产生、检测、消费和反应的软件设计方法。
